description: An ice rink is being used to treat Covid patients as Russia hopes its Sputnik V vaccine will resolve the crisis.
title: Coronavirus: Russia resists lockdown and pins hopes on vaccine
title_page: Coronavirus: Russia resists lockdown and pins hopes on vaccine - BBC News
maintext: "Our bosses asked us to take part," said the ER doctor, who has been working with Covid cases since April. "I've seen a lot of people who got sick, and it's not nice," Alexei explained. "So I'd prefer not to get it."
